About us

Apply innovative thinking to design solutions to common problems faced by the community around you, crowdsourced by DSC.

Give life to your innovative solutions by making practical use of learned theoretical knowledge, gaining necessary experience.

Be a part of a wide community of like-minded developers, where you can seek help and get a review, and provide your own expertise too.
